com.constantcontact.v2

Interface ContactService


  • public interface ContactService
    Retrofit interface for Contacts and Contact List calls against the Constant Contact API.

    See Working With Contacts on the Constant Contact Developer Website

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      retrofit2.Call<ContactList> createContactList(ContactList contactList)

      retrofit2.Call<SignupFormResponse> createCustomSignupForm(SignupFormRequest signupFormRequest)

      retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteContactList(java.lang.String listId)
      Delete a ContactList

      Get all ContactList in the account

    • Method Detail

      • getContacts

        @GET(value="v2/contacts")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Contact>> getContacts(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                     int limit,
                                                                     @Query(value="status")
                                                                     ContactStatus status)
        Get a Paged collection of Contact
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-500)
        status - Retrieve contacts with only the chosen ContactStatus
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Contacts

      • getContacts

        @GET(value="v2/contacts")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Contact>> getContacts(@Query(value="limit")
                                                                     int limit,
                                                                     @Query(value="modified_since")
                                                                     java.lang.String date,
                                                                     @Query(value="status")
                                                                     ContactStatus status)
        Get a Paged collection of Contact
        Parameters:
        limit - Size of page to return (1-500)
        date - Date to specify retrieval of contacts that have been modified since then, in ISO-8601 format
        status - Retrieve contacts with only the chosen ContactStatus
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Contacts

      • getContacts

        @GET(value="v2/lists/{listId}/contacts")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Contact>> getContacts(@Path(value="listId")
                                                                                    java.lang.String listId,
                                                                                    @Query(value="limit")
                                                                                    int limit,
                                                                                    @Query(value="modified_since")
                                                                                    java.lang.String date)
        Get a Paged collection of Contact from a specific ContactList
        Parameters:
        listId - ID of the ContactList to get Contacts from
        limit - Size of page to return (1-500)
        date - Date to specify retrieval of contacts that have been modified since then, in ISO-8601 format
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Contacts

      • getContacts

        @GET(value="v2/contacts?next={next}")
retrofit2.Call<Paged<Contact>> getContacts(@Path(value="next")
                                                                                 java.lang.String nextLink)
        Get a Paged collection of Contact from a previous call's next link.
        Parameters:
        nextLink - Value of the path found in the meta of the original call
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits Paged Contacts
        See Also:
        Paged

      • createContact

        @POST(value="v2/contacts")
retrofit2.Call<Contact> createContact(@Body
                                                                 Contact contact,
                                                                 @Query(value="action_by")
                                                                 OptInSource optInSource)
        Create an individual Contact
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact
        optInSource - Specify who is creating this contact with OptInSource
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a new Contact object, with changes by the server, such as adding an ID

      • getContact

        @GET(value="v2/contacts/{contactId}")
retrofit2.Call<Contact> getContact(@Path(value="contactId")
                                                                         java.lang.String contactId)
        Get an individual Contact
        Parameters:
        contactId - Contact's ID
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Contact

      • updateContact

        @PUT(value="v2/contacts/{contactId")
retrofit2.Call<Contact> updateContact(@Body
                                                                           Contact contact,
                                                                           @Path(value="contactId")
                                                                           java.lang.String contactId,
                                                                           @Query(value="action_by")
                                                                           OptInSource optInSource)
        Update an individual Contact
        Parameters:
        contact - Contact object with updated information
        contactId - Contact's ID
        optInSource - Specify who is updating this contact with OptInSource
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits an updated Contact

      • unsubscribeContact

        @DELETE(value="v2/contacts/{contactId}")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> unsubscribeContact(@Path(value="contactId")
                                                                                               java.lang.String contactId)
        Opt out an individual Contact
        Parameters:
        contactId - Contact's ID
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response

      • getContactLists

        @GET(value="v2/lists")
retrofit2.Call<java.util.List<ContactList>> getContactLists(@Query(value="modified_since")
                                                                                   java.lang.String date)
        Get all ContactList in the account
        Parameters:
        date - Date to specify retrieval of contact lists that have been modified since then, in ISO-8601 format
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a List of ContactLists

      • createContactList

        @POST(value="v2/lists")
retrofit2.Call<ContactList> createContactList(@Body
                                                                      ContactList contactList)
        Create a new ContactList
        Parameters:
        contactList - ContactList object (requires only name and status to create)
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a new ContactList object, with changes by the server, such as adding an ID

      • getContactList

        @GET(value="v2/lists/{listId}")
retrofit2.Call<ContactList> getContactList(@Path(value="listId")
                                                                           java.lang.String listId)
        Get a specific ContactList
        Parameters:
        listId - ID of the list
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a ContactList

      • updateContactList

        @PUT(value="v2/lists/{listId}")
retrofit2.Call<ContactList> updateContactList(@Body
                                                                              ContactList contactList,
                                                                              @Path(value="listId")
                                                                              java.lang.String listId)
        Update a ContactList
        Parameters:
        contactList - ContactList
        listId - ID of the list
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits an updated ContactList

      • deleteContactList

        @DELETE(value="v2/lists/{listId}")
retrofit2.Call<retrofit2.Response> deleteContactList(@Path(value="listId")
                                                                                        java.lang.String listId)
        Delete a ContactList
        Parameters:
        listId - ID of the list
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a Response

      • createCustomSignupForm

        @POST(value="v2/signupform")
retrofit2.Call<SignupFormResponse> createCustomSignupForm(@Body
                                                                                       SignupFormRequest signupFormRequest)
        Create a custom signup form
        Parameters:
        signupFormRequest - object that contains params for the signup form
        Returns:
        an Observable that emits a signup form response
        See Also:
        Signup Form Creation
